00021 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/GenericDataHeaderReader.h"

00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Constructor
00034  */
00035 GenericDataHeaderReader::GenericDataHeaderReader(std::ifstream& fs)
00036 : fileStream(fs)
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Reads the GenericDataHeader and all parent GenericDataHeaders.
00042  * Calls Read() with true to retain originqal intent.
00043  */
00044 void GenericDataHeaderReader::Read(GenericDataHeader& gdh)
00045 {
00046         // retain original calling logic.
00047         Read(gdh, true);
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Reads the GenericDataHeader and all parent GenericDataHeaders.
00052  * In call to AddNameValParam, doUniqueAdds is passed.
00053  */
00054 void GenericDataHeaderReader::Read(GenericDataHeader& gdh, bool doUniqueAdds)
00055 {
00056         // Read data type identifier
00057         gdh.SetFileTypeId(FileInput::ReadString8(fileStream));
00058 
00059         // Read file identifier
00060         gdh.SetFileId(FileInput::ReadString8(fileStream));
00061 
00062         // Read file creation time
00063         gdh.SetFileCreationTime(FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream));
00064 
00065         // Read locale
00066         gdh.SetLocale(FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream));
00067 
00068         // Read name value pairs
00069         u_int32_t paramCount = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00070         for (u_int32_t iparam = 0; iparam < paramCount; ++iparam)
00071         {
00072                 const void* mimeValue = 0;
00073                 std::wstring name = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00074                 int32_t mimeSize = FileInput::ReadBlob(fileStream,mimeValue);
00075                 std::wstring type = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00076                 ParameterNameValueType nvt(name,(void*)mimeValue, mimeSize, type);
00077                 // deleting a "const void*" generates a warning under gcc.
00078                 // cast to a "char*" to quiet it.
00079                 delete[] (char*)mimeValue;
00080                 gdh.AddNameValParam(nvt,doUniqueAdds);
00081         }
00082 
00083         // Read number of generic data parent header
00084         u_int32_t numParents = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00085 
00086         // Read each parent header in turn - this needs to be recursive
00087         for (u_int32_t iparent = 0; iparent < numParents; ++iparent)
00088         {
00089                 GenericDataHeader parentGDH;
00090                 Read(parentGDH);
00091                 gdh.AddParent(parentGDH);
00092         }
00093 }
